Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand's warm-up fixture against India was also washed out.
Lockie Ferguson and Adam Milne are managing their injuries.
Martin Guptill is relegated to the bench, and Finn Allen is bumped up to the top.
New Zealand have to choose between Mitchell Santner, Ish Sodhi, and Michael Bracewell.
Australia have lost spare wicketkeeper-batter Josh Inglis to a golf injury.
Matthew Wade, Josh Hazlewood, and Adam Zampa have excelled in T20 cricket over the past 12 months.
Tim David has a powerplay strike rate of 156.48, the best among all batters who have played at least ten innings during this phase since his T20I debut in March 2021.
Glenn Phillips is expected to feature due to Mitchell's injury.
Cameron Green has found a way into Australia's squad but may not be in the XI.
Kane Williamson didn't rule out the possibility of both Ferguson and Milne featuring in New Zealand's XI.
Finch said the pitch was on the drier side.
Miscellaneous Highlights: There is a 90% chance of rain in Sydney which may affect the match.
